mapper.select: select a.customerNum,b.projectNum,c.collectNum,d.leaveNum,e.birthdayNum from (select count(id) customerNum from cus_customer WHERE createtime>#{cmonthTime} AND createtime < #{cmonthEndTime}) a, (select count(id) projectNum from prj_project WHERE signtime>#{cmonthTime} AND signtime < #{cmonthEndTime}) b , (select ifnull(sum(money),0) collectNum from prj_collect WHERE time>#{cmonthTime} AND time < #{cmonthEndTime}) c , (select count(id) leaveNum from man_apply WHERE type=1 AND createtime>#{cmonthTime} AND createtime < #{cmonthEndTime}) d, (select count(id) birthdayNum from man_emp WHERE state=0 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(birthday/1000,'%m')=#{cmonth}) e

select a.salesmanid,a.collectNum,b.name empName from (select b.salesmanid, ifnull(sum(a.money),0) collectNum from prj_collect a left join prj_project b on a.prjid=b.id WHERE 1=1 AND a.time> #{starttime} AND a.time < #{endtime} GROUP BY b.salesmanid) a left join man_emp b on a.salesmanid=b.id WHERE b.state=0 ORDER BY a.collectNum DESC limit 10
